projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.briefDescription: A portfolio website detailing the projects I've made
projects.fullDescription:
The wesbite you're on right now!

This is a fullscreen scrolling website that seeks to tell people about myself.

It begins with a brief overview of who I am and how I got started in the tech sector, then going on to display all of the porjects that I have completed. With the ability to click on a project to read further information about it.

After this, there is a page that shows an overview of what technologies and frameworks I have experience using, followed by a hobbies page, and then ending on a contact page.

The website was built using Vite with React, written in JavaScript and JSX, with CSS styling.
